<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>0.0.1</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.sso.okta" name="SSO provided by Okta, Inc." version="0.0.1" provider_name="ServiceNow" invalidate_properties="true" startup="" state="published">
<description>Single Sign-On provided by Okta, Inc.</description>
<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="OktaApiAuthentication" class="com.snc.sso.okta.OktaApiAuthentication"/>
<requires> <import plugin="com.snc.integration.sso.saml20.update1"/> </requires> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Single Sign-On provided by Okta, Inc.</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.snc.sso.okta</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>SSO provided by Okta, Inc.</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.sso.okta/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.integration.sso.saml20.update1</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.sso.okta</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type/> <version>0.0.1</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
